name: Sidd's Test Game
description:
My first attempt at making a game using RPG Maker MZ. I have zero knowledge or experience and started this project while using the 20 day trial of MZ. Most of the game is pretty much RTP, pre-made maps, and such. Later half the game I started messing around with plugins and used some of Visustella's (https://visustellamz.itch.io/) free plugins for some quality of life. I had a few friends test it and I fixed most issues when found. Please give it a try and I hope you enjoy it. It's not a full game since it's mostly made for me to learn, but it's a good solid hour or so.

Features:

-Starting character choice between boy/girl

-Starting job choice Warrior/Sorcerer/Hunter/Bandit

-Unlockable jobs Martial Artist, Paladin, Spell Fencer, Lancer, and Healer.
